permissions.title: Your account details
permissions.description: The AISP must provide the PSU with a description of the data being requested

permissions.title: Your account basic
permissions.description: Ability to read basic account information

permissions.title: Your balances
permissions.description: Ability to read all balance information

permissions.title: Your transactions basic
permissions.description: Ability to read basic transaction information

permissions.title: Your transactions details
permissions.description: Ability to read transaction data elements which may hold silent party details

permissions.title: Your transactions credits
permissions.description: Ability to read only credit transactions

permissions.title: Your transactions debits
permissions.description: Ability to read only debit transactions
